title: Valantine Rp giveaway True of fake ?
body: So Riot pls help me i can't get my rp it says  i have 10 points but i cant get my rp i instaled solitare and says install 3 more apps but there are no apps and so on help me i want to get my rp code

replies.body:
We don't have any campaigns that ask you to install software or require you to earn points towards RP.  This sounds fake and super risky.  I suggest removing anything installed right way, and run through our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to make sure your information is safe.  

Then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and report whatever you're using to us, so we can investigate this further.  We don't want scammers going around trying to ruse players.  Thanks for the report!
